title: Commending Past Grand Knight James Mikowski as he is honored by Knights of Columbus Bellmore Council No. 3689 of Bellmore on January 22, 2011
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION commending Past Grand Knight James Mikowski upon
the occasion of his designation for special honor by Knights of Columbus
Bellmore Council No. 3689 of Massapequa Park, New York, at a Testimonial
Dinner on January 22, 2011

WHEREAS, Individuals who give of their time and energies and  serve  the
best interests of their communities are an asset beyond remuneration and
cannot be sufficiently extolled; and
  WHEREAS,  James  Mikowski  has given not only of his time and energies
but also of his competence, intelligence and leadership and consequently
has been designated for special honor; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body is justly proud to commend  Past  Grand
Knight  James  Mikowski upon the occasion of his designation for special
honor by Knights of Columbus Bellmore Council No. 3689 of Bellmore,  New
York,  at  a Testimonial Dinner to be held at the Bellmore Columbus Club
in Bellmore on Saturday evening, January 22, 2011; and
  WHEREAS, The Knights of Columbus is an international  Catholic  organ-
ization  with  over  1.7  million  members worldwide; it is dedicated to
working for the Catholic Church, community, and fellow  man;  each  year
the  Knights  of  Columbus  contributes several million dollars and well
over 60 million hours of personal service to charitable  and  benevolent
activities; and
  WHEREAS,  James  Mikowski  has been called upon to contribute his time
and talents to the Knights of Columbus and to countless other civic  and
charitable endeavors and has always given of himself unstintingly; and
  WHEREAS, James Mikowski's active involvement in the Long Island commu-
nity  and  in  the  Knights  of  Columbus has benefited the council, the
community and the church; he has  served  the  Knights  of  Columbus  in
numerous  capacities,  including  Grand  Knight  of Bellmore Council No.
3689; he has served ably in that position and, together with  his  wife,
Joann,  has helped make Bellmore Council No. 3689 an organization recog-
nized with pride throughout the Bellmore community; and
  WHEREAS, James Mikowski's service as Grand Knight has been  character-
ized  by  his  exemplary  leadership  and  has  been instrumental in the
continued success of Bellmore Council No. 3689; he has accomplished many
deeds of charity, unity, fraternity and patriotism in keeping  with  the
mission of the Knights of Columbus and has been a strong advocate of its
programs and of community awareness; and
  WHEREAS,  Throughout  the  entire  period  of  his Knights of Columbus
service, a period of constructive involvement, Past Grand  Knight  James
Mikowski has stood constant in dignity, good grace and humor; and
  WHEREAS, Rare indeed is the impressive dedication shown by an individ-
ual  for  the  benefit  of  others  which  James  Mikowski has displayed
throughout his life; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
commend Past Grand Knight James Mikowski upon the occasion of his desig-
nation  for  special  honor  by Knights of Columbus Bellmore Council No.
3689 of Bellmore at a Testimonial Dinner on January 22, 2011; and be  it
further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to James Mikowski.
